course.title: Graphic Design Basics
course.short_description: Master visual storytelling using Canva, Photoshop & more. Learn color theory, typography, and layout design.

instructorDetails.name: Ayesha Khan
instructorDetails.title: Creative Director at DesignPro Studio
instructorDetails.bio: Ayesha has mentored over 500 aspiring designers and brings more than 8 years of industry experience in branding, advertising, and visual design.

description: Unlock your creativity and build a strong foundation in graphic design with this beginner-friendly course.
You'll explore essential principles such as color theory, typography, composition, and branding while working on real design projects.
Using tools like Canva and Adobe Photoshop, you’ll learn how to create compelling visuals for social media, marketing, and personal portfolios.

course.title: Web Development Bootcamp
course.short_description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and build real websites from scratch.

instructorDetails.name: Paulo Dichone
instructorDetails.title: Senior Web Developer at CodeLabs
instructorDetails.bio: Jane has over 10 years of experience in full-stack development and loves teaching.

description: Kickstart your journey into the world of web development with this comprehensive bootcamp.
Learn how to build responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript—from the ground up.
Understand core development principles, work with real projects, and gain hands-on coding experience.

course.title: Digital Marketing 101
course.short_description: Discover social media, SEO, and email marketing strategies.

instructorDetails.name: Frank Kane
instructorDetails.title: Digital Marketing Consultant & Trainer
instructorDetails.bio: Frank has worked with Fortune 500 brands to grow their digital presence. He brings practical insights into every session.

description: This beginner-friendly course introduces core digital marketing tools and techniques.
Explore social media strategies, SEO optimization, and impactful email campaigns.
Learn how to analyze trends and grow your online visibility effectively.

course.title: Photography Masterclass
course.short_description: Capture stunning photos and learn editing techniques.

instructorDetails.name: John Smith
instructorDetails.title: Professional Photographer & Editor
instructorDetails.bio: John has spent over a decade behind the lens and has taught photography across the globe.

description: Learn how to shoot breathtaking images with proper lighting and composition.
Understand your camera settings and master essential photo editing skills.
Turn your passion into a professional skill with real-world projects.

course.title: Freelancing on Fiverr
course.short_description: Learn how to set up gigs and get paid online from day one.

instructorDetails.name: Deborah Grayson Riege
instructorDetails.title: Fiverr Top Rated Seller & Coach
instructorDetails.bio: Deborah helps new freelancers succeed by sharing practical gig setup and marketing strategies.

description: Get started with Fiverr by creating high-converting gigs in top categories.
Learn to manage orders, communicate with clients, and build a 5-star rating.
Start earning from your skills without any prior freelancing experience.

course.title: UI/UX Fundamentals
course.short_description: Understand user flow, wireframes, and UI basics.

instructorDetails.name: Sara Malik
instructorDetails.title: UX Designer at Creatix Studio
instructorDetails.bio: Sara has worked on award-winning UX projects and mentors aspiring designers worldwide.

description: Dive into the world of user experience and intuitive interface design.
Understand wireframes, usability principles, and the tools UX designers use daily.
Ideal for beginners looking to start a UI/UX design career.

course.title: Python for Beginners
course.short_description: Start coding with Python — learn logic, loops, and build real applications.

instructorDetails.name: Kamal Abraham
instructorDetails.title: Software Engineer & Python Enthusiast
instructorDetails.bio: Kamal loves simplifying programming concepts and making Python fun for all learners.

description: Learn Python programming from scratch with real-world coding examples.
Understand loops, functions, and conditional logic through hands-on practice.
Build mini projects to reinforce your understanding and logic-building skills.

course.title: Start a Freelancing Career
course.short_description: Build your freelance brand on Upwork, LinkedIn, and attract clients.

instructorDetails.name: Zain Ali
instructorDetails.title: Freelance Strategist & Career Coach
instructorDetails.bio: Zain has helped hundreds of students transition to full-time freelance careers with confidence.

description: Craft a powerful freelancer profile that gets noticed on top platforms.
Discover how to pitch, price, and deliver projects professionally.
Start getting paid for your skills by working with global clients.
